key_risks: Financial instability and history of net losses
Reliance on technology exposing to platform downtime, cybersecurity threats, and data privacy concerns
Market saturation and pricing pressures in the EdTech sector
Regulatory scrutiny in the education space
controversies: Non-compliance with NYSE listing standards due to share price falling below $1.00
Investigation by Purcell & Lefkowitz LLP for potential securities fraud and breaches of fiduciary duty
social_issues: Data privacy concerns related to user information on the platform
governance_issues: Breaches of fiduciary duty under scrutiny
